input package¶

Submodules¶

input.source_function module¶

This script contains functions to export source time function given a certain time vector and parameters necessary.

input.source_function.gaussian(t, a, b, c)[source]¶

This function computes a gaussian pulse given the parameters a,b,c and a time vector t

Parameters:
  • t – 1D numpy array
  • a – float
  • b – float
  • c – float
Return type:

1D numpy array of the same size as t

Mathematical formulation:

\[f(x)=ae^{-{\frac {(x-b)^{2}}{2c^{2}}}}\]
input.source_function.ricker(t, t0, p0)[source]¶

This function computes the Ricker Wavelet given a dominant period p0, time vector t and origin t0

Parameters:
  • t – time vector
  • t0 – origin of symmetry vector
  • p0 – dominant period
Return type:

vector containing ricker function values
\[s(t) = -8/p_0(t-t_0)e^{\frac{(t-t0)^2}{(4/p_0)^2}}\]
input.source_function.rickerSEM(dt, pt)[source]¶

Taken from seismolive
